title: QuiQ (Quantum Path Finder)
description: An app made in JS and Python to determine the best addition in the NYC subway system by simulating qubits.

title: Library Management App
description: A management app made using Tkinter to make library administration 75% automatic.

title: Automatic Folding Board
description: A sketch made using Arduino language for automatically folding clothes using ultrasonic sensors and servo motors.

title: PDF Templates
description: A script that generates PDF templates of multiple pages given some predefined guidelines.

title: Weather Forecast Web App
description: A web-app that works with a weather API to display temperature and rainfall of any city on a graph.

title: AI Chess App
description: A chess app made in C++ and Python which acts as a low-level chess-engine.

title: Todo App
description: A distraction-free web app to help you focus on creating and completing tasks.

title: PDF Invoices
description: A script that reads invoice records from Excel files and automatically generates PDF invoices.

title: Weather API
description: A REST API built with Python and Flask to serve historical weather data for various cities.
